overview: He is a graphic designer graduated from ORT Technical School, a professional illustrator graduated from the Garaycochea School and has a vast experience in visual communication. He worked as an art director in several projects related to design, film, animation, advertising, web and illustration. With his experience on the design field and working with international companies oriented to the communications market allows him to interpret the needs of each client. Nowadays he coordinates and develops projects oriented to the international market, mainly Europe, United States, Canada and New Zeland.
